title: Payment Orchestration Platform
description: Built a multi-PSP payment routing engine with intelligent retry logic, achieving 15%+ approval rate lift and 40% decline reduction.
fullDescription: A comprehensive payment orchestration layer that sits between merchants and multiple payment service providers (PSPs). The system intelligently routes transactions based on success probability, cost optimization, and issuer-specific patterns.
problem: Enterprise merchants were experiencing high decline rates and suboptimal approval rates due to reliance on single PSPs.
constraints: Had to maintain sub-100ms latency, support 50+ PSP integrations, and ensure PCI-DSS Level 1 compliance.
approach: Built a routing engine with ML-based decline prediction, implemented cascading retry logic, and created a unified API layer.
tradeoffs: Chose eventual consistency for analytics to prioritize transaction speed. Accepted higher infrastructure costs for redundancy.
execution: 6-month development cycle with 3 engineers. Phased rollout starting with low-risk transaction types.
outcomes: 15%+ approval rate lift, 40% decline reduction, $2M+ additional revenue captured annually for initial clients.
whatIdImprove: Would invest more in real-time monitoring dashboards earlier. Would also build a self-service configuration UI for routing rules.
